content: ***labyrinth lullaby bonding squares crochet pattern*** this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad--free printer friendly pdf for a small fee https //greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/labyrinth-lullaby-crochet-preemie-bonding-square-pattern-free ✦ make a soft bonding square with this pdf pattern ✦ help a preemie bond with their mother and family ✦ donate to your local nicu or favorite preemie charity ✦ works up beautifully using super soft cherished yarn ✦ soft bonding squares make an amazing donation or gift ✦ this is an intermediate crochet pattern utilizing a few advanced stitches including foundation half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in 3rd loop herringbone half_double_crochet puff st --> click here to join my email newsletter and get a coupon for $2 off any pattern in my ravelry shop --> **join newsletter now ** 1 --> click here to join my vip facebook community for exclusive discounts cals giveaways and more --> **join the fb group ** 2 **what is included ** 6 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well **sizes ** 5 inch square **materials ** dk/baby weight 3 yarn 40-50 yards per square 80-100 yards per set i/9 5 5 mm hook yarn needle scissors **stitch key ** slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hhdc - herringbone half_double_crochet tutorial included puff st - puff tutorial included lem peel st - lemon peel stitch tutorial included half_double_crochet 3rd lp - half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop tutorial included fhdc - foundation half_double_crochet tutorial included blo - back loop only ***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern *** due to the nature of digital downloads there are no refunds for this item i am here to help if you have any questions my email and social media contacts are included with each pattern purchase as well as photo tutorials for challenging or unusual stitches you may sell items you make using this pattern if you sell them online please provide a link back to my shop this pattern is for use by the purchaser only and cannot be sold copied or used for mass production you may not use my photographs thank you lisa fox **my website and blog with other *free* patterns ** www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/ **find me on etsy ** https //www etsy com/shop/greenfoxfarms follow me i share updates photos and occasional giveaways and sales on my social media pages come join the fun https //www instagram com/greenfoxfarms/ https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarms/ 1 https //greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/newsletter 2 https //www facebook com/groups/greenfoxfarms
